participant_abstract.sent: We brought together the project with a prototype and an evaluation of this prototype.
We firstly dicussed the various aspects of the prototype and discussed its benefits in relation to various criteria.
We then looked at whether the features we had decided upon would be affordable.
We made several adjustments after this wasn't the case and then went on to re-evaluate the design.

participant_decisions.sent: That the original prototype was a good design but cost too much.
That the tecnological aspects of the design were more important than the casing.
That it would be a good idea if possible to have coloured buttons to make things more clear (and it was possible).
That the final design fit the budget and the criteria fairly well.

participant_problems.sent: We had to give up some things - decide which aspects of the design were more important Meeting seemed to lose direction somewhat.
